name: Mothers of the Flame Pendant
description: Hailing from the searing apex of Mt. Kalfus, the Mothers of the Flame Pendant are known for the lengths theyâ€™ll go to get their due. Over both injustice and insult. Now serving as full-time mercenaries (and part-time arsonists), they look towards the future with a glint in their eye. Their future is bright. The only question: what comes next?
